item.description:
We'll meet in the parking lot of the Bikeway Source. It's a big red barn building. You can rent equipment if you don't have your own bike or helmet.
111 South Road
Bedford, MA 01730

Locally:
Heading east on the Great Road in Bedford, make a right at the first light in Bedford onto South Road. We are 1/2 mile down South Road, on the right, in the big red barn. Heading west on Route 62, make a right onto the Great Road in Bedford. At the next set of lights, make a left onto Loomis St. We are the end of Loomis St. in the big red barn.


Click map for more details.

By Bike From Boston:
Jump on the Minuteman Bikeway and head West all the way to the end, we are the big red barn at the end of the Bikeway.

By Bike From Concord:
Take Route 62 heading West towards Bedford. Take a right onto McMahon Ave, it will be shortly after the childcare center called "Place To Grow" on the right. Bear left onto Railroad Ave keeping the Elementary school on your right. We'll be on your right at the stop lights in the big red barn.

From the North:
Take either Route 3 or I-93 south to I-95/128 South. Take I-95/128 to Exit 31B. Go through 3 sets of traffic lights. At the fourth set, in front of the CVS, take a left onto Loomis St. We are the end of Loomis St. in the big red barn.

From the South:
Take I-93 north to I-95/128 North. Take I-95/128 North to Exit 31B. Go through 3 sets of traffic lights. At the fourth set, in front of the CVS, take a left onto Loomis St. We are the end of Loomis St. in the big red barn.

From the East:
Either I-90 or Route 2 west to I-95/128 North. Take I-95/128 North to Exit 31B. Go through 3 sets of traffic lights. At the fourth set, in front of the CVS, take a left onto Loomis St. We are the end of Loomis St. in the big red barn.

From the West:
Take either I-90 or Route 2 east to I-95/128 North. Take I-95/128 North to Exit 31B. Go through 3 sets of traffic lights. At the fourth set, in front of the CVS, take a left onto Loomis St. We are the end of Loomis St. in the big red barn.

group.name: The Chestnut Hill Walking Meetup Group

item.name: BIKE RIDE - MINUTE MAN BIKE TRAIL - BEDFORD MASS.
